title.rendered: “IDF Targets Hezbollah Terror Sites in Lebanon: An Insight into Overnight Military Operations”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF targeted terror sites in Lebanon overnight; in addition, a short while ago, a military building harboring a terrorist was attacked.

During the night, air force combat planes attacked several military infrastructures of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in the Beqaa region.

Moreover, shortly before, an observer from the 869th Intelligence unit identified a terrorist in a military building of the Hezbollah terrorist organization at the Merkava region. Shortly after, air force combat planes attacked the building where the terrorist was located.

Footage from the attack on the military building is attached: https://bit.ly/44rmSy7.
